verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> and the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> commanded <WH6680> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Keep <WH8104> all the commandment <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>.

And it shall be on the day <WH3117> when ye shall pass over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> unto the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee <WH6965>, that thou shalt set thee up great <WH1419> stones <WH68>, and plaster <WH7874> them with plaster <WH7874>:

and thou shalt write <WH3789> upon them all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451>, when thou art passed over <WH5674>; that thou mayest go in <WH935> unto the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee <WH776>, a land flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, as Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of thy fathers <WH1>, hath promised thee <WH1696>.

And it shall be <WH5674>, when ye are passed over the Jordan <WH3383>, that ye shall set up <WH6965> these stones <WH68>, which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, in mount <WH2022> Ebal <WH5858>, and thou shalt plaster <WH7875> them with plaster <WH7875>.
And there shalt thou build <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, an altar <WH4196> of stones <WH68>: thou shalt lift up <WH5130> no iron tool upon them <WH1270>.

Thou shalt build <WH1129> the altar <WH4196> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> of unhewn <WH8003> stones <WH68>; and thou shalt offer <WH5927> burnt-offerings <WH5930> thereon unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>:
and thou shalt sacrifice <WH2076> peace-offerings <WH8002>, and shalt eat <WH398> there <WH8055>; and thou shalt rejoice before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.
And thou shalt write <WH3789> upon the stones <WH68> all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451> very <WH3190> plainly <WH874>.

And Moses <WH4872> and the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> spake <WH1696> unto all Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, Keep silence <WH5535>, and hearken <WH8085>, O Israel <WH3478>: this day <WH3117> thou art become <WH1961> the people <WH5971> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.

Thou shalt therefore obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and do <WH6213> his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2706>, which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>.
And Moses <WH4872> charged <WH6680> the people <WH5971> the same day <WH3117>, saying <WH559>,

These shall stand <WH5975> upon mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630> to bless <WH1288> the people <WH5971>, when ye are passed over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383>: Simeon <WH8095>, and Levi <WH3878>, and Judah <WH3063>, and Issachar <WH3485>, and Joseph <WH3130>, and Benjamin <WH1144>.
And these shall stand <WH5975> upon mount <WH2022> Ebal <WH5858> for the curse <WH7045>: Reuben <WH7205>, Gad <WH1410>, and Asher <WH836>, and Zebulun <WH2074>, Dan <WH1835>, and Naphtali <WH5321>.
And the Levites <WH3881> shall answer <WH6030>, and say <WH559> unto all the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> with a loud <WH7311> voice <WH6963>,

Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> that maketh <WH6213> a graven <WH6459> or molten image <WH4541>, an abomination <WH8441> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, the work <WH4639> of the hands <WH3027> of the craftsman <WH2796>, and setteth <WH7760> it up in secret <WH5643>. And all the people <WH5971> shall answer <WH6030> and say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that setteth light <WH7034> by his father <WH1> or his mother <WH517>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that removeth <WH5253> his neighbor <WH7453>'s landmark <WH1366>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that maketh the blind <WH5787> to wander <WH7686> out of the way <WH1870>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that wresteth <WH5186> the justice <WH4941> due to the sojourner <WH1616>, fatherless <WH3490>, and widow <WH490>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.

Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth <WH7901> with his father <WH1>'s wife <WH802>, because he hath uncovered <WH1540> his father <WH1>'s skirt <WH3671>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth <WH7901> with any manner of beast <WH929>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.

Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth <WH7901> with his sister <WH269>, the daughter <WH1323> of his father <WH1>, or the daughter <WH1323> of his mother <WH517>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth <WH7901> with his mother-in <WH2859>-law. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that smiteth <WH5221> his neighbor <WH7453> in secret <WH5643>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that taketh <WH3947> a bribe <WH7810> to slay <WH5221> an innocent <WH5355> person <WH5315>. And all the people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that confirmeth <WH6965> not the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451> to do <WH6213> them <WH5971>. And all the people shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>.
